org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.util
 

  • Uses of NodeAssert in org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.util

    Methods in org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.util that return NodeAssert
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    NodeAssert
    NodeAssert.assertHasNode(String relPath)
    Asserts that the node has a child node at the relative path.
    NodeAssert
    NodeAssert.assertHasProperty(String name)
    Asserts that the node has a property (without checking value).
    NodeAssert
    NodeAssert.assertName(String expected)
    Asserts that the node name matches the expected value.
    NodeAssert
    NodeAssert.assertNotHasNode(String relPath)
    Asserts that the node does NOT have a child node at the relative path.
    NodeAssert
    NodeAssert.assertPath(String expected)
    Asserts that the node path matches the expected value.
    NodeAssert
    NodeAssert.assertPrimaryType(String expected)
    Asserts that the node has the expected primary type.
    NodeAssert
    NodeAssert.assertProperty(String name, String expected)
    Asserts that the node has a property with the expected string value.
    NodeAssert
    NodeAssert.assertPropertyBoolean(String name, boolean expected)
    Asserts that the node has a property with the expected boolean value.
    NodeAssert
    NodeAssert.assertPropertyLong(String name, long expected)
    Asserts that the node has a property with the expected long value.
    NodeAssert
    NodeAssert.getChildNode(String relPath)
    Gets a child node and returns a NodeAssert for it.
    NodeAssert
    RepositorySession.getNode(String path)
    Gets a node and returns a NodeAssert for fluent assertions.
    NodeAssert
    RepositorySession.getRootNode()
    Gets the root node.
